name: Graverobbers - GJL Game Parade 2020 Jam
description:
A little jam game I made for the week-long Game Jobs Live - Game Parade 2020 jam, for which the theme was "Carpe Diem".

Rob as much gold from the cemetery as you can and escape before midnight! Be careful – the inhabitants might not take too kindly to your presence.

Stop the timer by placing purple crosses on the monolith face.

CONTROLS

MOUSELookWASDMovementSPACEJumpEInteract
